1.0.name: wordpress/ajax-contact-form
1.0.description:
This plugin will help you to send mail using ajax from your wordpress site. You can design your own contact form from the admin. There will be a email list waiting for your review. There are several options for the contact that you can update later. You just need to put shortcode [ajaxcf] in any page/post. There is also custom css area in the admin.

Features

  • ajax with contact form
  • form design usability
  • ultimate email list
  • options page
  • shortcode
  • simple to use and update
  • custom css
